alert.note: Alert for Dallas; Grant; Hot Spring (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued December 10 at 2:01PM CST by NWS Little Rock
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Grant, northern Dallas and southeastern Hot Spring Counties through 230 PM CST... At 200 PM CST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Thiel, or 10 miles southeast of Malvern, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Malvern... Sheridan... Leola... Prattsville... Poyen... Perla... Thiel... Jenkins Ferry State Park... Dogwood... Ain... Lono... Cross Roads in Grant County... Slabtown... Prague... Buie... Willow... Center Grove... Grapevine... Brush Creek... Millerville... MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
